## Числительные в языках Америки: языковые семьи
<a href="http://web-corpora.net/~agricolamz/maps/AtCauc/Numearals.Amerika.atlas/family/numerals.america.family.big.html"> во весь экран </a>
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
setwd("/home/agricolamz/_DATA/OneDrive1/_Work/Atlas.of.Caucasian.Languages/Numearals.Amerika.atlas/family")
america <- read.csv("MapLang.csv")
america <- america[1:81*2,]
colnames(america)[14] <- ("fnam")
colnames(america)[5] <- ("limit")
colnames(america)[6] <- ("adding")
colnames(america)[9] <- ("base")
library(leaflet)
pal <- colorFactor(c( "#00FF00", # Algic
                      "#FFD700", # Araucanian
                      "#EA7500", # Arawakan
                      "#006633", # Arawan
                      "#FFDDC7", # Athapaskan-Eyak-Tlingit
                      "#5509D9", # Boran
                      "#B54E09", # Carib
                      "#E85313", # Chapacuran
                      "#FFD800", # Chibchan
                      "#BEF574", # Chinookan
                      "#ECEBBD", # Chocoan
                      "#FF4F00", # Chumashan
                      "#98FF98", # Eskimo-Aleut
                      "#C3B091", # Iroquoian
                      "#0B8A3E", # Isolate
                      "#996666", # Kiowa-Tanoan
                      "#1DACD6", # Mayan
                      "#924E7D", # Mixe-Zoque
                      "#CCCCFF", # Muskogean
                      "#1974D2", # Nadahup
                      "#0AF7D3", # Nambiquaran
                      "#FFDEAD", # Otomanguean
                      "#00BFFF", # Palaihnihan
                      "#E000E0", # Pano-Tacanan
                      "#561394", # Quechuan
                      "#FF9ECF", # Salishan
                      "#FF4255", # Siouan
                      "#E0FFFF", # Tacanan
                      "#B0C4DE", # Totonacan
                      "#7442C8", # Tucanoan
                      "#00CCCC", # Tupian
                      "#3B2316", # Uto-Aztecan
                      "#721422" # Wakashan
                      ), domain = america$fnam)

m <- leaflet(america) %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addCircleMarkers(lng=america$lng, # широта
                   lat=america$lat, # долгота
                   popup=america$lang, # высвечивается при нажатии
                   stroke = T, # нужна ли обводка для кружочков
                   radius = 5, # радиус маркера
                   fillOpacity = 1, # прозрачность
                   color = pal(america$fnam),
                   group = america$fnam) %>%
addLegend(position = c("bottomleft"),
          pal = pal,# раскраска
          values = america$fnam,
          opacity = 1) %>%
addLayersControl(overlayGroups = america$fnam,
                 options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = F))
m
```
